Name: Movie Quest
About the game: This game plays older movies that are in the public domain because of copyright laws but they're enjoyable classics! Remember the times at the movies? Maybe you've got friends all over the world or want to go on a virtual date? How will you get together to watch a movie? With Movie Quest you can! Settle down and watch an action flick, quest, roleplay, challenge each other to get through a horror show! But wait, there's more - level up, play in the arcade for prizes, throw popcorn, eat pizza, even work in the movie theater with multiple classes of characters like movie theater manager. Features: Watch real movies, roleplay and socialize together, rpg elements like leveling, questing, items, idle experience, play Flappy Happy in the arcade, turn in your quest tickets for prizes, multiple characters, classes*(coming soon)
